item.title: SparkAR filter for Bangladesh victory day celebration 2021
item.description: We are under development right now Twitter As it is my 1st SparkAR effect so may not be smooth enough, yet working on improving my skill. You can try them on Facebook: https://t.co/WAobiKY0GZ and Instagram: https://t.co/2p1n7MBVas Thank You ‚ù§Ô∏èüáßüá©#sparkar #bangladesh #1971war #16th #december #victoryday — Riyadh Uddin (@RiyadhUddin_) December 13, 2021 Youtube

Privacy Policy Riyadh Uddin built the iacdrops app as an Open Source app. This SERVICE is provided by iacdrops at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service. If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.
